button.pay.description: Button text for paying the order.

button.continuePay.description: Button text for continuing the payment of the order.

button.checkDetail.description: Button text for viewing order details.

button.query.description: Button text for querying the order.

button.finish.description: Button text for manually completing the order.

button.update.description: Button text for updating the order.

field.amount.description: The point amount of the order.

field.price.description: The point amount of the order.

field.createdAt.description: The creation time of the order.

field.payWay.description: The payment method for the order.

field.proxy.description: Proxy is an online service for transmitting data via HTTP.

message.orderExpired.message: The order has expired, please create a new order to make a payment.
message.orderExpired.description: Message indicating the order has expired.

message.wechatPayHelp.message: Please open WeChat on your phone and scan the code to complete the payment.

message.buyInExternalUrl.message: Please complete the payment in the external link.
message.buyInExternalUrl.description: Message for payment via external link.

message.confirmFinish.message: This action will manually set the order to paid status and complete distribution processing, and cannot be undone. Please confirm the customer has completed the payment, would you like to proceed?

state.pending.description: The status of the order, indicating this order is still waiting for the user to pay.

state.paid.description: The status of the order, indicating this order has been paid.

state.finished.description: The status of the order, indicating this order has been completed.

state.expired.description: The status of the order, indicating this order has expired.

state.failed.description: The status of the order, indicating this order payment failed.

title.info.description: Title used for the website indicating order information.

title.wechatPay.description: Title used for the website indicating WeChat payment.

title.aliPay.description: Title used for the website indicating Alipay payment, Alipay payment is an online payment.

title.stripe.description: Title used for the website indicating Stripe payment, Stripe payment is an online payment.

title.manageOrder.description: Title used for the website indicating order management.
